title: cultural_data_Access_Houston_Museum_of_Natural_Science
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.infiniteach.accessibility.houstonmuseumofnaturalscience.
Application Name: Access Houston Museum of Natural Science.
Number of Reviews: 5.00.
Application Description: Come explore Houston Museum of Natural Science’s 4 floors of exhibits! The Museum is home to the Burke Baker Planetarium, Wortham GIANT Screen Theatre, Cockrell Butterfly Center and a fascinating variety of permanent exhibit areas that examine astronomy, space science, Native American culture, paleontology, energy, chemistry, gems and minerals, seashells, Texas wildlife and much more.Access HMNS was developed to help all families and school groups, especially those with disabilities or young children, prepare for a day at the museum. In the app, you’ll be able to learn more about our exhibits, create your own schedule for the day, play HMNS memory, and check out features like our sensory-friendly map and insider tips. We can’t wait to welcome you to the museum!Read moreCollapse.
